original_text: The Lord hath made known his salvation: his righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 구원을 알게 하시며 그의 공의를 뭇 나라의 목전에서 명백히 나타내셨도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord hath made known his salvation:
his righteousness hath he openly shewed
in the sight of the heathen.
